hero.name: Mohamed Mounir
hero.title: Flutter Developer
hero.subtitle: Building cross-platform mobile applications with clean architecture and scalable code

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am Mohamed Mounir a highly skilled Flutter Developer with over 3 years of experience building cross-platform mobile applications with clean architecture and scalable code. Proven expertise in delivering production-ready apps across industries such as chat monetization, ride-hailing, car rentals, and gamified shop app.
about.highlight: Top Rated Flutter Developer on Upwork
about.upwork_description: Recognized for consistent high-quality work, timely delivery, and excellent client satisfaction. Adapt at collaborating with cross-functional teams, integrating third-party services, and deploying to both iOS and Android platforms. Passionate about crafting user-centric mobile experiences that drive engagement and business growth.

alpha_drive.name: Alpha Drive
alpha_drive.description: A ride-hailing mobile application similar to Uber/InDriver, tailored for the Jordanian market.
alpha_drive.feature_1: Real-time ride request and matching system
alpha_drive.feature_4: In-app chat between drivers and passengers

chaqt.name: CHAQT
chaqt.description: A chat monetization mobile app for experts, influencers, and service providers.

marketplace.name: Marketplace App
marketplace.description: A full-featured marketplace mobile app MVP designed to provide a seamless shopping experience similar to Amazon.

lahzi.name: Lahzi
lahzi.description: A gamified e-commerce mobile app where product prices drop in real time over a limited period.
lahzi.feature_1: Dynamic price-drop engine with countdown timers

rentx.name: Rentx
rentx.description: A mobile car rental application providing a seamless experience for users to browse, reserve, and manage vehicle rentals.

alpha_drive.title: Flutter Developer - Full Time
alpha_drive.description: Contributed to the development of a ride-hailing mobile application similar to Uber/InDriver, tailored for the Jordanian market.
alpha_drive.achievement_1: Implemented real-time ride request and matching system between drivers and passengers using WebSockets and location services
alpha_drive.achievement_2: Integrated interactive maps and live tracking using Google Maps API for both drivers and passengers
alpha_drive.achievement_3: Built features including: Fare estimation and dynamic pricing logic, Trip status updates, In-app chat between drivers and passengers

chaqt.title: Flutter Developer - Part Time
chaqt.description: Developed and maintained a chat monetization mobile app for experts, influencers, and service providers using Flutter and Dart.
chaqt.achievement_1: Implemented dynamic per-message pricing features including: Character-based pricing for text messages, Duration-based pricing for voice messages
chaqt.achievement_2: Built real-time chat features such as typing indicators, recording status, online/offline presence, message read receipts, message replies, starred messages, and more
chaqt.achievement_3: Integrated Apple and Google in-app subscriptions to unlock premium features and extended monetization controls

diyar.title: Flutter Developer - Freelance
diyar.description: At Diyar United Company, I worked as a Flutter developer on the MVP of a full-featured marketplace mobile app, designed to provide a seamless shopping experience similar to Amazon.

nextera.title: Flutter Developer - Part Time
nextera.description: Developed a gamified e-commerce mobile app where product prices drop in real time over a limited period, creating a sense of urgency and competition among buyers.
nextera.achievement_1: Implemented a dynamic price-drop engine with countdown timers and real-time UI updates synced via sockets
nextera.achievement_2: Built live product offer screens displaying, Initial and minimum price thresholds, Real-time price progression, Time remaining for each deal
nextera.achievement_3: Integrated purchase locking mechanism to ensure fair price claims during active countdowns

rentx.title: Flutter Developer - Full Time
rentx.description: Developed a mobile car rental application from scratch, providing a seamless experience for users to browse, reserve, and manage vehicle rentals.
rentx.achievement_1: Real-time car availability with calendar-based booking system
rentx.achievement_2: Filter and search by car type, model, price, transmission, and fuel type
rentx.achievement_3: Integrated user authentication, driver license upload, and identity verification processes
rentx.achievement_4: Developed comprehensive pricing logic, including hourly, daily, and weekly rates
rentx.achievement_5: Implemented in-app booking management: view, edit, extend, or cancel bookings
rentx.achievement_6: Integrated payment gateway to handle secure online transactions
